oai_dc:dc.dc:title: DESIGN FORMULAS FOR PI CONTROLLERS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: SOMANI, MK
KOTHARE, MV
CHIDAMBARAM, M
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A simple derivation is given for PI Controller parameters for first-order plus delay processes. Analytical solutions are given for the controller parameters for the limiting values of tau1/tau(d) and tau2/tau(d) for second-order plus delay processes.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: RESEARCH INST TECHNICAL CHEMISTRY OF HUNGARIAN ACAD SCIENCES
